title: GFG Campus Body - Q3 Roadmap
content:
Plan for Q3:
1. Organize a university-level hackathon - 'CodeCrush 2025'.
2. Conduct bi-weekly workshops on DSA and Web Development.
3. Collaborate with the placement cell for mock interviews.
description: Strategic planning document outlining the goals and key activities for the GeeksforGeeks Campus Body for the third quarter.
author: Lucifer

title: Advanced DSA Notes (PDF)
content: This document contains notes on advanced Data Structures and Algorithms including Graphs, Dynamic Programming, and Tries.
description: Comprehensive notes for final year students preparing for placements. Sourced from multiple top educators.
author: Lucifer

title: My Secret Project Ideas
content:
- AI-based resume builder
- Real-time attendance tracker using face-rec
- A social network for book lovers
description: A quick scratchpad for brainstorming future project ideas. Confidential.
author: Lucifer

title: Useful ChatGPT Prompts
content:
1. 'Act as a senior software developer and review the following Python code for bugs and optimization opportunities...'
2. 'Explain the concept of React Server Components to a 5-year-old.'
description: A collection of effective prompts for interacting with LLMs like ChatGPT for coding, learning, and content creation.
author: Lucifer

title: React Official Docs
description: The official documentation for React. The best place to start for learning modern React with hooks and concurrent features.
author: Lucifer
